name: Min'atoa Station
description:
Min’atoa Station - beautiful, mysterious, deserted. Good luck getting out.

A single player, first-person fantasy mystery in an otherworldly setting of light and colour. Explore the deserted crystal portal station, slowly uncover the bright and dark secrets of this seemingly lovely prism world; restore equipment, and use the strange technology to escape. 

A gripping story, found in the letters of star-crossed lovers, of hate and heroism in a world facing imminent catastrophe. Can you make the difference?

Themes: Racial & cultural prejudice

By Escape Velocity Studios - Jayne Gale and Brian McClintock
